cn.lpermission: 现在我们会请求您同意我们发送通知，不然您将无法收到任务开始的提示。
cn.1apprunning: 当前只允许运行一个Mr Noplay程序。
cn.properwaytoexit: 请在允许的时候，通过应用内的关闭按钮退出应用。
cn.todayiwillplay: 今天内，我最多休息/玩/电脑工作
cn.firstsavefiles: 点击“停止”后电脑将关闭请务必先保存
cn.cancelweb: 非电脑版不会进行关机操作
cn.willpunish: 时间已经结束，请于3分钟内停止，否则将被惩罚。
cn.10willforce: 超时10分钟后会强制结束！
cn.about: 关于 不玩家 Mr Noplay
cn.abouttext: 不再为休息/玩电脑的时间难以控制而烦恼。
cn.canopenlater: 以后可以在“关于”界面再次调出哦
cn.tostartonlogin: 现在打开设置，然后打开开机自启。设置应用开机自启对于防止无计划的过度娱乐很有帮助

1.2: 你一定有这样的经历：你想着自己就玩5分钟，结果一上午没了。工作时效率再高，也难以抵挡连续玩太久对计划的拖延。你需要不玩家，进行合理的休息娱乐，然后在计划的时间内回到工作。

2.2: 玩着玩着就会停不下来，但最开始还是对时间有预算的，设置好时间，点击开始按钮，在旅途的最开始，就给自己一个明确的时间限度。

3.2: 开始以后在电脑版点击'停止'就会
3.4: ，以防止时间不受控制。当然，在15秒内，你可以点击“取消”改变计划。

4.2: 预定的时间结束后，进入超时阶段。超时3分钟还未主动停止的，将接受恼人声音、弹窗和通知等惩罚。10分钟还未结束的，
4.3: 将在提示以后强制关机

5.2: 支持中英双语言，支持开机自启。关闭窗口后，通过如上图所示状态栏图标重新打开应用。还有更多功能等待你的发现！

cn.updatefailedtext: 请检查您的互联网连接。
cn.updateoktext: 现在，我们将指引您前去更新。
cn.noupdatetext: 目前没有更新，请稍后再试！
cn.checking: 稍后会弹出窗口提示更新状态。

webversion.1: 由于浏览器限制，网页版只包括少部分功能
webversion.2: 请去官网下载电脑版，同时支持 Win 和 Mac

cn.theme-notice1: 在配置较低的电脑上，不推荐现实样式
cn.theme-notice2: 否则可能造成卡顿，或运行速度减慢
cn.lockmode-notice1: 打开控制模式，将禁用设置
cn.lockmode-notice2: 同时退出 Mr Noplay 必须输入密码
cn.confirm-shutdown-text: 请留意点击‘停止’后将关机。为了防止误触，我们发送了这条提醒，但只会提醒一次。
cn.foundupdate: 请去设置界面下载。最近一次更新的更新内容：
cn.clicktoseetoday: 点击这里，查看“今日”视图和数据统计
cn.st_help_finished: 新建任务，点击‘停止’结束的次数
cn.st_help_rpoint: 完成任务时根据超时情况获得R点，故意退出等情况扣除R点，R点可以用于今日时间用完而有急事时兑换更多时间
cn.cannotexittext: 已经设置今日总时间，不允许退出 Mr Noplay
cn.cannotchecktext: 已经设置今日总时间，不允许检测更新
cn.cannotgithub: 已经设置今日总时间，不允许查看 Github 页面
cn.cannotwebsite: 已经设置今日总时间，不允许查看网站
cn.cannotfeedback: 因为已经设置今日总时间，目前不能进行反馈
cn.cannotdownloadtext: 因为已经设置今日总时间，目前不能下载组件
cn.cannotsetblacklisttext: 因为已经设置今日总时间，目前不能设置应用黑名单
cn.moretime-ask: 请输入您完成工作还需要多少时间
cn.onlyinworkmode: 此选项仅在电脑工作模式启用
cn.timetillshutdown: 强制关机前剩余的时间

overinfo.1: 我们只在超时时展示不使人产生困扰的广告。
overinfo.2: 超时超过3分钟后，将有恼人声音、弹窗等惩罚。
overinfo.3: 点击‘停止’按钮后将关机，请先保存所有文档。
overinfo.4: 现在立刻停止！这样，你可以获得1个R点。

cn.kioskbug: 似乎没有正确退出全屏，这可能是因为本软件所使用框架的一个 bug 导致的，请点击取消，回到主界面点击右上角退出按钮，然后重新启动 Mr Noplay
cn.blacklistdesc: 应用黑名单组件允许在工作模式计时时屏蔽选择的应用。此可选组件不默认安装，需额外下载安装。
cn.blacklistdesc-installed: 应用黑名单组件在工作模式计时时屏蔽你选择的应用

en.lpermission: Now we will ask for permission to send you notifications. Please allow this, or we won't be able to notice you that it's time to start working on your tasks.
en.unsupported: The app can have only 1 instance running.
en.properwaytoexit: You must close the app by buttons inside the app.
en.firstsavefiles: When clicking 'stop', we'll shut down. Save files first.
en.cancel15s: Can be canceled in 15s. Canceling doesn't shutdown.
en.cancelweb: Only win/mac version can shut the computer down.
en.willpunish: Time is up. In 3 min you'll be punished if don't stop.
en.10willforce: After 10 min, your computer will be forced to shut down.
en.abouttext: Give an end to no-end rests and play times.
en.canopenlater: Tutorial can be opened from about page.
en.tostartonlogin: Open Settings and Set Auto Launch Now, This is Beneficial on Reducing Out-of-plan Playing!

1.2: You must have experienced this: Thinking that I'll just play for a while, but end up wasting all day. What you need is not only productivity at work, but also the time limitation for rest and playing.

2.2: You'll find it hard to stop after playing for a while, so you can follow our routine, to set a time limitation for yourself before you start.

3.2: When you click 'Stop' on computer, your computer will be
3.4: to stop time from being uncontrollable. But you can cancel within 15s.

4.2: After time stopped, it comes to overtime period. After 3 minutes, you'll be annoyed by scary sound, pop-ups and notifications. And after 10 minutes,
4.3: you'll be notified and forced to shut down

5.2: Support both Chinese and English. Support auto-launch. Support status bar icon. More functions are waiting for you to explore!

en.updatefailedtext: Maybe your Web Connection is Down.
en.updateoktext: Let's Go to Website to See it.
en.noupdatetext: Currently, We don't Have an Update.
en.defaulttimesuccess: The default time is set successfully.

webversion.1: Web version is limited due to the browser's limitation
webversion.2: Go to the website and download win/mac version

en.theme-notice1: We don't recommend you to use
en.lockmode-notice2: And you must enter password to exit
en.confirm-shutdown-text: After clicking on 'Stop', the computer will shutdown. In order to prevent mistake touches, we displayes this notice, but only once.
en.foundupdate: You can download it in Settings. What's new in the latest update:
en.clicktoseetoday: Click and see Today View and Statistics
en.clicktoseemain: Click and go back to Main View
en.st_help_finished: Number of times the task was started and exited properly
en.st_help_rpoint: Get R Point by completing task on time, and R Point can be used to redeem more time when running out of today's time.
en.nowstop: Just Stop now and then you can get
en.nowexitillegally: If you exit the app illegally, you will lose
en.illegal: Found the app was closed illegally
en.illegaltext: To punish it, you lose 10 R Point.
en.cannotexittext: You can't exit Mr Noplay after Today Time is set.
en.cannotchecktext: You can't check update after Today Time is set.
en.cannotgithub: You can't go to Github page after Today Time is set.
en.cannotwebsite: You can't go to the website after Today Time is set.
en.cannotfeedback: You can't go to feedback page after Today Time is set.
en.cannotpatreon: Sorry but you can't go to patreon page after Today Time is set.
en.cannotdownloadtext: You can't download component after Today Time is set.
en.cannotsetblacklisttext: You can't set blacklist after Today Time is set.
en.onlyinworkmode: You can only use this in Work mode

overinfo.1: We display ads only during over-time.
overinfo.2: Annoying music'll be sent as punishment in 3 min
overinfo.3: Clicking on 'STOP' will shut the computer down.
overinfo.4: Stop right now and you'll be able to earn 1 R Point.

en.kioskbug: It seems that you didn't exit fullscreen mode, probably because of a bug from the framework used by Mr Noplay, you can click Cancel, then click the X Button on the top, then open mr noplay again.
en.blacklistdesc: The App Blacklist component can forbid apps from running when timing in work mode. But it is not installed now. You can download and install it.
en.blacklistdesc-installed: The App Blacklist component can forbid apps from running when timing in work mode.
